channel.title: ISTE RIT CHAPTER
channel.description: The Indian Society for Technical Education is a national, professional, non-profit Society registered under the Indian Societies Registration Act

item.title: Python Workshop
item.description: Code powers our digital world; websites, applications, calculators, and even household microwave ovens rely on code in order to operate. As python is the most versatile and beginner-friendly language, ISTE RIT SC organized a python workshop for the benefit of students. An hour-long webinar was handled by Nikitha Raj S6 CSE on 18th May 2021 6 pm -7 pm. Over 260 students participated in the workshop. The session covered topics such as variables, identifiers, different data types, along with some data structures and their handling. Nikitha maintained an interactive background throughout the session. Satisfying comments and feedback obtained from students complemented the success of the event.The Event was coordinated by Anand S, Ashly Elizabeth, Heba Fathima, Krishnanandh, Neeshma Jose, Sandra Santhosh, Sidharth, Sreelakshmi V and Sreeparvathy.

item.title: Avengers Infinite Quest
item.description: A three round competition was conducted as a part of the Swadhyaya Series to find the greatest marvel fan. The first phase of the quest was an MCQ based quiz that was held with the help of quizizz website at 06:30pm ,134 among the 136 registrations attended the MCQ and 30 among them were selected for the 2nd phase . The 2nd phase was to write a fanfiction story and 5 among 28 responses were selected for the final phase . The event helped students for stress relief and improved their creative thinking ability . The 3rd round was made available for non participants to watch as well and was made interactive with the audience as well . 1st prize was awarded to Anandu S Krishnan of NSS College of engineering palakkad. The event was concluded with a thank you message from the secretory of ISTE SC RIT. The Event was coordinated by Sumith Sunil, Nandana Gopan, Lakshmi V, Amal Roy, Mehrunnisa and Resmiya V S.

item.title: ISTE State Convention
item.description: The always leading richness of ISTE has brought about several pinnacles over the years. And as a further lead to its flourishing, its 16th ISTE State Convention for the year 2018 as SANGRAH ‘18 was held at GCE Kannur. RIT chapter did its best for this convention and was in the top 15 list from around 40+ colleges. We are proud to announce that our students Shinoy Jayan K.D. & Sanjay Krishna J have secured 1st place in technical event named ‘you wire’. It was a wiring competition where circuit lay out and condition to be obtained are given to the participant and the evaluation was strictly based on output, time taken for work, quality of work etc. This highlights the interest of students to participate in more events and also a sign of perfect utilisation of ISTE’s opportunities. We are glad that we could be a platform for them and we congratulate the winners and also those who took part in Sangrah18 from ISTE RIT chapter. We wish we could achieve more.

item.title: Techvridhi
item.description:
RIT Students bagged prizes from IIT Kharagpur

Events

  • Inter-Collegiate Quiz Competition
  • Inter-Collegiate Debate Competition

The students of semester 4, AKHIL SURESH, AKHIL MURALI, AJIN KP, JINO THOMAS, TESWIN JOSE of Civil department participated in the National Championship for Mechanical and Civil representing the ISTE RIT chapter as a part of Global Entrepreneurship Summit conducted at IIT Kharagpur held in 2nd and 3rd Feb 2018. They were awarded 2nd position for the same. _ Hearty congratulations for the shinning stars._
